mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL , article_no , parent_no , LPAD(' ', 4 * (LEVEL-1)) || title AS title , content , write_date , id FROM t30_board START WITH parent_no = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR article_no = parent_no ORDER SIBLINGS BY article_no DESC

SELECT recNum , "level" , article_no , parent_no , title , content , write_date , id FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS recNum , "level" , article_no , parent_no , title , content , write_date , id FROM (SELECT LEVEL AS "level" , article_no , parent_no , LPAD(' ', 4 * (LEVEL - 1)) || title AS title , content , write_date , id FROM t30_board START WITH parent_no = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR article_no = parent_no ORDER SIBLINGS BY article_no DESC) ) WHERE recNum BETWEEN (#{section} - 1) * 100 + (#{pageNum} - 1) * 10 + 1 AND (#{section} - 1) * 100 + #{pageNum} * 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t30_board (article_no, parent_no, title, content, image_file_name, id) VALUES (#{articleNo}, #{parentNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t30_board WHERE article_no IN ( SELECT article_no FROM t30_board START WITH article_no = #{articleNo} CONNECT BY PRIOR article_no = parent_no )
mapper.select: SELECT article_no FROM t30_board START WITH article_no = #{articleNo} CONNECT BY PRIOR article_no = parent_no
